headline: The Pause
description: A watcher stands beneath an eclipsed sun—a charged stillness between revelations. Faith abides without spectacle, awaiting the next dawn.
author: Aleksandr Agnitio

motifMap.meaning: Hidden source of light—revelation veiled yet persistent
Divine geometry; alignment without full visibility
Witnessing without grasping; fidelity in unknowing
Promise of return; the next illumination beyond the present hush

associatedMedia.description: Illustration of a lone figure beneath an eclipsed sun haloed with faint rings.
